name: Suicide Runners
description:
Classic 2D shoot em up with updated graphics. Dodge a storm of bullets as you blast through space shooting hordes of enemies. Collect powerups to survive against fearsome bosses. Pilot a suicide runner as you fight to unravel the mystery of what is destroying the universe.

Collect Powerups To Even The Odds



Fight Enemies of all Sizes



Dodge Bullets To Survive



Bosses



Features
Choose your own difficulty from 3 lives to 99 lives
8 Handcrafted levels to master
Multiple bosses to overcome and destroy
All sorts of powerups to collect from cannons to rockets
